allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update event date to March 1, 2026 and location to Carlisle Expo Center

- Updated countdown timer to March 1, 2026
- Removed seconds from countdown \(now shows days, hours, minutes\)
- Added date and location display under the countdown timer
- Updated all screens \(Home, Event, Tickets\) with new date and location

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(Carlisle Expo Center"
- Changed countdown interval to 1 second for responsive minute updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
